Reminiscences of Tschaikowsky [arr. Godfrey]
Horsham, Sussex Southern Counties Amateur Brass and Reed Bands Association Contest - Champion Section 1st prize £12 and cup, 2nd prize £9,3rd prize £6. March contest 1st Reading Temperance, 2nd East Grinstead Town. 4 bands competed.
Sept. 9, 2013, 8:06 p.m. Sept. 14, 2018, 9:49 a.m.
1 Reading Temperance W. Farr
2 Dorking Town A. Williams
3 East Grinstead Town O. H. Taylor
4 Redhill Town Unknown
